评论详情: Very tight, makes circulation better for all things. I wear at night and morning, during the day, so only parts of the day. Wear and feel like me, like snake got you wrapped up, but in a good way.

I had 7 procedures done on my veins and have had tower compression hose for 14 days following each one.  These are more comfortable and easier to put on than the ones I wore following knee surgery.  I highly recommend them.
This helped with my legs after my procedure on my veins. Highly recommended!
